string.value: #p9010010# wants to talk to you... She's been busy these days teasing #p9000042#. What could she want?

#p9010010# says that #b#p9000042##k seems to have become involved in something strange again and asks that you help him. It's about taking care of an egg or something. In any case #p9010010# seems to care about #p9000042# after all...

#p9010010# says that #b#p9000042##k seems to have become involved in something strange again and asks that you help him. It's about taking care of an egg or something. In any case #p9010010# seems to care about #p9000042# after all...

Ugh, #b#p9000042##k has gotten himself into trouble again. He always does this to himself. He has decided to #btake care of an egg that a Migratory Bird left behind#k. But who knows whether it really belongs to a Migratory Bird...
If we leave #p9000042# alone, I think he'll pass out from fatigue. Won't you go help him? I'll give you a buff once a day if you log in when #p9000042# is taking care of the egg.
I'm counting on you to help #p9000042#.
Fine then. I can't force you to help him. Who will help #p9000042# then...?
